entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as a possible location where Ron's anger could be directed. ("But that could be at the Burrow")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being angry and his emotions are discussed by Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is experiencing pain in his scar and is trying to concentrate. He also has a connection with Voldemort that he is trying to close.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being frightened and trying to help Harry understand what's happening with his scar.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who can plant false images in Harry's mind if he doesn't close the connection between them.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as wanting Harry to shut down the connection with Voldemort and use Occlumency instead.

relationships.description: Ron's anger is directed at the Burrow, as suggested by Harry and Hermione's conversation.
Harry has a connection with Voldemort that he is trying to close, as mentioned in the conversation between him and Hermione.
